## Christmas Bird Count

The Brandon Christmas Bird Count will be taking place on December 15th, 2024. If you would like to participate in the count as either a Field Counter, a Feeder Watcher, or both, please sign up at [this form](https://forms.gle/NsdCmRXkpVsHdKYz7).

Results from our past counts will be added to this page at a later date.
